title: Padded cell
content:
There (she) is beneath the soft ceiling
Nails too short to tear down scraps of yellow wallpaper
Mask too thin to fend off smoke from the attic aflame
Limbs too weak to hold up an emaciated body upside down
Lips too stiff to scream in the voice of the mother
There (she) is amid the solid silence
too sane to dissolve into the letters left with no escape but to squeeze in between the lines

title: Vampire
content:
The night I turned into a vampire I looked into the mirror and saw the reflection of nothing but void
My existence shattered into pieces flinging themselves out of reality into the otherly to be scattered across the words of others
No one is paying me a visit tonight as I lie in my bed, or casket, awaiting the break of dawn

title: R.I.P
content:
R.I.P
Ladies and gentlemen Pick a side â€”â€”
triangle or rectangle
hair bow or smoking pipe
high heels or Oxford shoes
red or blue
Cleopatra or Tutankhamun
Pick a side, now
lady or gentleman
and may you rest in peace
in your assigned
Restroomâ„¢ï¸

title: Countdown
content:
We can count to ten with one hand
Tie a noose, Ten Hang a hook, Nine Fire a shot, Eight Pinch your nose, Seven Make the call, Six Slap a face, Five
Shhhhhâ€¦.
Three at the table Two chopsticks in hand Pointed finger then clenched fist
Count to 10 in binary starting from Abandon through Martyrdom and Menopause ending at Zenith
And start over again
